title: respect to which, pursuant to section 100(2)(b) of that Act, a draft has been laid
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Temporary Business
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Temporary Business 
Energy Support Scheme) (Energy Costs Threshold Aggregate Amount) (No. 2) 
Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2022 (temporary business energy support scheme) (energy cost threshold aggregate amount) (no 2) order 2023

title: respect to which, pursuant to section 100(2)(b) of that Act, a draft has been laid
heading: 2. With effect as on and from 1 March 2023, the amount of €45,000 shall
text_raw:
2. With effect as on and from 1 March 2023, the amount of €45,000 shall 
stand substituted for the amount of €30,000 being the amount for the time 
being specified in paragraph (b)(i) of section 101(9) (other than the amount 
represented by “B” in the formula in the said paragraph (b)(i) of section 
101(9)) of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 February, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [74] 3
